name: QWERTY Conquest
description:
QWERTY Conquest is a typing focused fighter RPG. You can explore many lands, collect weapons, and battle to your heart's content! The novel combo mechanism allows you to perform a portion of the combo move with each letter of the word. 

The current demo is a simple side scrolling, platformer, arena fighter. This functionality will serve as the battle sequence for the main game upon its release. The rest of the game will be a top-down adventure RPG. 

What to expect? Dev here - This is a solo project at the moment. I have a lot of work to do building the world for the RPG, but I wanted to get this demo out to get some hype for the main game. I intend to update the demo fairly regularly as I add more weapons and monsters to the game so that they can be battle tested as I develop the world to explore. If you find any glitches, be sure to post them in the thread below. There is a separate thread for sharing any uploaded gameplay. I definitely want to see how people react and how I can make the game better!
